QuestData.Title: Psycho Mantid
QuestData.Description: You aren't going to believe what I saw! Two mantid fighting each other, whipping some serious magic back and forth.$B$BOne of them didn't look like any mantid I've ever seen. Completely different color and dress to him, like some kind of... oracle or something. The other one was a total psycho, splashing sha energy around like it was a keg of Stormstout Special.$B$BLook, I gotta get back to my post, but those two are still fighting in the cave behind me and I have a feeling it's a big deal. Check it out?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A mantid wielding the power of sha like a weapon? How can this be?
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the mantid infighting at the Terrace of Gurthan.
QuestData.RewardText: <This mantid is severely wounded. He barely manages to choke forth his words between wheezing gasps for breath.>$B$BHold, $r...$B$BWe are... not your enemy.
